en.latex:
$$
\begin{align}
& 2 \div \frac{a+b}{a+2 b} \times \frac{b^{2}-b a-6 a^{2}}{a^{2}-4 b^{2}} \times \frac{a^{2}-a b-2 b^{2}}{3 a-b}\\
&=-2(b+2 a)\\
&=-2 b-4 a
\end{align}
$$
en.html:
$$
\begin{align}
& 2 \div \frac{a+b}{a+2 b} \times \frac{b^{2}-b a-6 a^{2}}{a^{2}-4 b^{2}} \times \frac{a^{2}-a b-2 b^{2}}{3 a-b}\\
&=-2(b+2 a)\\
&=-2 b-4 a
\end{align}
$$
